lead_paragraph: While their former schools are still yearning for tournament glory, Coach Gary Waters and point guard Cedric Jackson have provided show-stopping moments with Cleveland State.
snippet: While their former schools are still yearning for tournament glory, Coach Gary Waters and point guard Cedric Jackson have provided show-stopping moments with Cleveland State.
